response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is valued at $1,500,000 to you, and we believe it would significantly contribute to your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer represents an exceptional value, considering the immense benefits and returns the product can provide. We hope to facilitate a transaction that is mutually beneficial and aligns with both our interests. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
